Plot: Three friends are asked to be bridesmaids at a wedding of a woman they used to ridicule back in high school.
Title: Bachelorette
Writer: Leslye Headland (screenplay), Leslye Headland (based on the play by)
Actors: Kirsten Dunst, Rebel Wilson, Lizzy Caplan, Paul Corning
tomatoConsensus: It has its moments, but Bachelorette ultimately plays it too safe with its trio of unlikable leads, betraying them with a predictably sentimental final act that undermines the bracingly honest humor preceding it.
